segments.text: Wow , the ferris wheel over there is so big . I'd like to take a ride on it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Look at your right-hand . Is it the zone of the Lost Maya Kingdom ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe . Oh . I see the Jungle Flying Train . I once rode it.It was very exciting .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to have a try later .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Me , too . Daniel , look at your left side . Can you see the Air Force Ants ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow , that's my favorite . It's like a superman shooting right up into the sky .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good , you can make your dream come true here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course . After this , I want to show you to the Haunted House .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So you can prove you are a man .
segments.speaker: S2
